statements: SELECT * FROM virtual_classroom_resources;
SELECT resource_id, resource_name FROM virtual_classroom_resources WHERE resource_type = 'Document';
SELECT resource_id, resource_name, resource_description FROM virtual_classroom_resources WHERE resource_id = 2;
SELECT resource_id, resource_type FROM virtual_classroom_resources ORDER BY resource_type DESC;
SELECT resource_id, resource_name, resource_link FROM virtual_classroom_resources WHERE resource_type = 'Video' ORDER BY resource_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM virtual_classroom_resources WHERE resource_type = 'video' ORDER BY resource_name ASC;
SELECT resource_name, resource_link FROM virtual_classroom_resources WHERE resource_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT resource_name, resource_type FROM virtual_classroom_resources WHERE resource_id = 2;
SELECT resource_name, resource_description, resource_link FROM virtual_classroom_resources WHERE resource_type = 'document' ORDER BY resource_id DESC;
SELECT resource_name, resource_type, resource_description FROM virtual_classroom_resources WHERE resource_description LIKE '%tutorial%';
SELECT id, material_name, material_type FROM reference_materials;
SELECT author, material_name, material_type, upload_date FROM reference_materials ORDER BY material_name DESC;
SELECT id, link_title, link_url FROM external_links;
SELECT * FROM reference_materials WHERE author='John Doe';
SELECT id, description, category FROM external_links WHERE category='Science';
SELECT * FROM reference_materials WHERE material_type = 'Book' ORDER BY material_name ASC;
SELECT material_name, author FROM reference_materials WHERE upload_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY author ASC;
SELECT link_title, link_url FROM external_links WHERE category = 'Research' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM reference_materials WHERE author LIKE '%Smith%' AND material_type = 'Journal' ORDER BY upload_date DESC;
SELECT id, material_name, author FROM reference_materials WHERE material_type = 'Article' AND author <> 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM materials;
SELECT title,content FROM materials WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id,title FROM external_links WHERE id > 3;
SELECT description,type FROM resources WHERE type = 'document';
SELECT * FROM external_links WHERE url LIKE '%.com';
SELECT * FROM materials WHERE id = 1;
SELECT title, content FROM materials ORDER BY title DESC;
SELECT * FROM resources WHERE type = 'book';
SELECT id, title, url FROM external_links WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT r.id, m.title, e.url FROM resources r LEFT JOIN materials m ON r.linked_material_id = m.id LEFT JOIN external_links e ON r.linked_link_id = e.id;
SELECT * FROM reference_materials;
SELECT id, title, author FROM reference_materials ORDER BY author DESC;
SELECT title, author, category FROM reference_materials WHERE category = 'Science';
SELECT id, title, url FROM reference_materials JOIN external_links ON reference_materials.id = external_links.id;
SELECT id, name, email FROM users WHERE user_id < 10;
SELECT * FROM reference_materials WHERE category = 'Science' ORDER BY title DESC;
SELECT title, author FROM reference_materials WHERE author LIKE '%Smith%' AND category = 'Books';
SELECT r.title, l.url, l.description FROM reference_materials r INNER JOIN materials_to_links mtl ON r.id = mtl.material_id INNER JOIN external_links l ON mtl.link_id = l.id;
SELECT u.name, u.email, r.title FROM users u INNER JOIN reference_materials r ON u.user_id = r.id WHERE r.category = 'Research';

SELECT DISTINCT r.author, l.title FROM reference_materials r INNER JOIN materials_to_links mtl ON r.id = mtl.material_id INNER JOIN external_links l ON mtl.link_id = l.id WHERE r.category = 'Articles' ORDER BY r.author ASC, l.title DESC;
SELECT * FROM virtual_classroom_resource;
SELECT resource_name, resource_type FROM virtual_classroom_resource WHERE resource_type='video';
SELECT * FROM reference_material ORDER BY material_title DESC;
SELECT material_title, material_content FROM reference_material WHERE material_type='book';
SELECT link_title, link_url, link_description FROM external_link LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM virtual_classroom_resource;
SELECT resource_name, resource_type FROM virtual_classroom_resource WHERE resource_type='video';

SELECT r.resource_name, m.material_title, l.link_url FROM virtual_classroom_resource r INNER JOIN reference_material m ON r.resource_id = m.material_id INNER JOIN external_link l ON r.resource_id = l.link_id;

SELECT r.resource_name, c.category_name FROM virtual_classroom_resource r INNER JOIN resource_mapping m ON r.resource_id = m.resource_id INNER JOIN resource_category c ON m.category_id = c.category_id;
SELECT * FROM virtual_classroom_resource ORDER BY resource_name DESC, resource_type ASC;
